titles.title: Honoring the 600th anniversary of the birth of Gjergj Castrioti (Scanderbeg), statesman, diplomat, and military genius, for his role in saving Western Europe from Ottoman occupation.
Honoring the 600th anniversary of the birth of Gjergj Castrioti (Scanderbeg), statesman, diplomat, and military genius, for his role in saving Western Europe from Ottoman occupation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Commemorates the achievements of Gjergj Castrioti Scanderbeg and the 600th anniversary of his birth.
Commends Albanians everywhere for honoring their valiant leader, Gjergj Castrioti.
Urges the U.S. government to work with its European partners to accelerate the integration of Albania and a free Kosova into the European Union (EU), in recognition of the great contribution and sacrifice made by Gjergj Castrioti and the Albanian people in saving Western Europe from Ottoman domination.
